/usr/bin/c++ -fPIC -O3 -DNDEBUG  -shared -Wl,-soname,input_opencv.so -o input_opencv.so CMakeFiles/input_opencv.dir/input_opencv.cpp.o /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libopencv_highgui.so.3.2.0 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libopencv_videoio.so.3.2.0 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libopencv_imgproc.so.3.2.0 /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libopencv_core.so.3.2.0
